description: This Canon PowerShot A85 4MP digital camera has a slight twist. It has a 1.8” TFT color LCD screen has an astonishing 118,000 pixels of resolution for clear and crisp shot set-ups and playbacks. The camera has a 4.0 megapixel resolution that gives you larger and more detailed images. It is also equipped with a 3x optical/3.6x digital/11x combined zoom power that gets you closer to the image. Camera also includes VGA-size (640x480) movie mode, 9-point autofocus with special scene modes, built-in flash, has auto and red-eye reduction on/off operation modes and is PC and Mac compatible. Accepts a CompactFlash Type I memory card. Imported. 2-1/2Hx4Wx1-1/4D”.
title: Canon PowerShot A85 4MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom
